name: FARM
description: Mootrack is a cattle-raising registry platform and marketplace that integrates Solana blockchain technology to modernize livestock trading. The platform is designed to facilitate seamless connections between cattle buyers and sellers, ensuring transparency and efficiency. The $FARM token is powering subscriptions and enabling users to access premium features. Mootrack's objective is to redefine outdated livestock trading practices by providing a secure, blockchain-based solution that benefits all stakeholders involved in the cattle industry.
